messages.text:
Mina
Avatar
Make a demo video

Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant from ArenaGen. I can help you create a great video.

Here is a plan for your demo video.

Topic	Product Demonstration
Audience	Potential Customers
Music Theme	Uplifting Corporate
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	The avatar you provided: 
Confident Professional in Navy Blazer

Voice	The voice of the provided avatar.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media
Captions	Enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

Got it. Here is the updated plan with captions disabled.
